first_para: Norman John Baker PC (born 26 July 1957) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Lewes in East Sussex since 1997.

full.extract:
Norman John Baker PC (born 26 July 1957) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Lewes in East Sussex since 1997.
On 7 October 2013, Baker was appointed Minister of State at the Home Office in the Coalition Government. Baker resigned from his role as Minister for the Home Office on 3 November 2014.
full.title: Norman Baker
